step_data.thought:
I'm now on the Index Management page, which shows a list of all the indexers in Magento. This page allows management of data synchronization for various parts of the system like catalog search, product prices, inventory, etc. 

Looking at the current accessibility tree, I can see that this page displays indexers with their status and update mode. However, I don't see a direct 'Retry Synchronization' link or button on this page.

In Magento, when there are data synchronization issues, you typically need to reindex the affected data. This is essentially 'retrying synchronization' in Magento terminology. 

I need to look for other system areas that might contain the specific 'Retry Synchronization' feature. Let me check the SYSTEM menu again to see if there's another section I missed that might contain this functionality.
